what: Your Package Title in Title Case
title: Your Package Title in Title Case
text: ji.rpkg.template template package repository future Jameel Institute packages based. use template, select ji.rpkg.template drop-menu Repository template creating new repository Jameel Institute organisation. Replace instances “ji.rpkg.template” package name. Make sure also: Edit DESCRIPTION appropriate correct package information; Edit files R/, tests/, vignettes/ suit package; Remove instructions README.Rmd, re-render .md file using devtools::render_readme().

title: Your Package Title in Title Case
text: NOTE: Remove comment installation sources appropriate. can install development version ji.rpkg.template Jameel Institute R-universe : GitHub GitHub :
code: # installation from R-universe # install.packages( #   "ji.rpkg.template",  #   repos = c( #     "https://jameel-institute.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org" #   ) # ) # install.packages("pak") # pak::pak("jameel-institute/ji.rpkg.template")
